extends Room

    Philipp Fortmann

    • Constructor Detail

      • StorageRoom

        public StorageRoom(int room)
        Constructor creates the room with distinct amount and max values depending on which storage room is to be created
        Parameters:

    • Method Detail

      • increaseMax

        public int increaseMax(int drink,
                       int inc)
        increases the max value of a drink
        Parameters:
        drink - the drink where max will be increased
        inc - value by which max is increased
        Returns:
        returns one if successful

      • decreaseMax

        public int decreaseMax(int drink,
                       int dec)
        decreases the max value of a drink, if possible
        Parameters:
        drink - the drink where max will be decreased
        dec - value by which max is decreased (positive integer)
        Returns:
        returns 1 if successful, 4 if max can't be lowered (because it would go under amount or because it would go under zero
